archimate:BusinessObject.name: Solution
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
DESCRIPTION: A solution consists of one or more Solution Building Blocks to meet a certain stakeholder need. Within the context of the EIRAÂ©, a solution is usually an Interoperable European Solution developed by public administrations that facilitate the delivery of electronic Public Services and cross-border exchange of information between public administrations or Citizens in support to the implementation and advancement of EU, national or local public policies.
Inspired by TOGAF https://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/togaf9-doc/arch/chap03.html#tag_03_69
